atk-s0402a58:0_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
atk-s0402a58:1_1: The third shallow of the cloth.”
atk-s0402a58:1_2: One who first gets rid of ten ploughed and a wiping sticks.
atk-s0402a58:1_3: He made the mother of the father.
atk-s0402a58:1_4: Whoever makes a living depend on the meaning of what is beneficial.
atk-s0402a58:1_5: But when Vaṅgīsa extols, he does not express his own discriminate.
atk-s0402a58:2_0: The third sub-chapter on misconduct is finished.
